name: Wbcom Designs – BuddyPress Ads
author: Wbcom Designs

sections.description: Do you consider integrating your BuddyPress community to enhance customer satisfaction and encourage more site engagement? You can improve your site’s visibility by displaying ads in various BuddyPress locations, such as the activity page, group page, and member page. You can even choose the position of the ads based on your needs.
sections.installation:
1. Upload buddypress-ads.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Integrate your BuddyPress community to provide a smooth customer experience and increase site engagement.
description: Do you consider integrating your BuddyPress community to enhance customer satisfaction and encourage more site engagement? You can improve your site’s visibility by displaying ads in various BuddyPress locations, such as the activity page, group page, and member page. You can even choose the position of the ads based on your needs.
